biolockj.module.assembly

Class GenomeAssembly

  • java.lang.Object
    • biolockj.module.BioModuleImpl
      • biolockj.module.ScriptModuleImpl
        • biolockj.module.SeqModuleImpl
          • biolockj.module.assembly.GenomeAssembly
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ApiModule, BioModule, ScriptModule, SeqModule, Comparable<BioModule>

    public class GenomeAssembly
extends SeqModuleImpl
implements ApiModule
    This BioModule builds the bash scripts used to assemble WGS sequences with MetaSPAdes, bin contigs with Metabat2 and check quality with checkM.
    GUI Module Name
    Genome Assembly

      • buildScriptForPairedReads

        public List<List<String>> buildScriptForPairedReads(List<File> files)
                                             throws Exception
        MetaSPAdes doesn't require parameters besides input files and output directory. Default threads is 16 and memory is 250G
        Verify no invalid runtime params are passed and add rankSwitch if needed.
        Specified by:
        buildScriptForPairedReads in interface ScriptModule
        Overrides:
        buildScriptForPairedReads in class ScriptModuleImpl
        Parameters:
        files - Files in the input directory that contain only paired reads
        Returns:
        runtime parameters
        Throws:
        Exception - if errors occur

      • getCitationString

        public String getCitationString()
        Description copied from interface: ApiModule
        At a minimum, this should return the name and/or url for the wrapped tool. For BioLockJ home-grown modules, it can cite BioLockJ and give the current version. Ideally this will include the version for the wrapped tool. Tool version may require using a stored variable that can be filled in during execution; and the string that is returned pre-execution may not have the version.
        Specified by:
        getCitationString in interface ApiModule
        Returns:
